article_title: Walter Energy Receives 30 More Days of Cash Access
article_text:
Walter Energy Inc. (WLTGQ) was granted continued access to cash for another month as the coal company looks to reset and negotiate a new restructuring deal.

The approval of a new so-called cash collateral motion--a deal that protects lenders while providing Walter permission to spend cash securing those lenders’ debt--represents the company’s only chance to piece together a new restructuring deal after the agreement it entered...
